character.name: Matt
character.living_situation: One-bedroom apartment in suburban apartment complex

style.work: Business casual (button-down shirts, chinos, leather shoes)

prompt_templates.base_character: 1boy, young adult man, short brown hair, average build, clean-shaven, anime style, detailed
prompt_templates.morning_appearance: 1boy, young adult man, short brown hair, slight stubble, tired eyes, anime style, sleepy expression
prompt_templates.work_attire: 1boy, young adult man, short brown hair, wearing light blue button-down shirt, khaki chinos, brown leather belt, brown dress shoes, office worker, anime style
prompt_templates.casual_attire: 1boy, young adult man, short brown hair, wearing gray t-shirt, navy pajama pants, relaxed, anime style
prompt_templates.groomed_appearance: 1boy, young adult man, short brown hair neatly styled, clean-shaven, alert expression, professional, anime style

lora_settings.notes: Start with 0.8 and adjust based on consistency results. Lower if character features are too exaggerated, higher if not consistent enough.

reference_images.strategy: Use existing anime character LoRA from CivitAI for POC
reference_images.alternative_1: Generate 3-5 consistent anime images and use with IP-Adapter
reference_images.alternative_2: Train custom anime LoRA with 15-20 reference images

flexible_features: exact hair style (as long as short and brown)
avoid_variations: Facial hair (except morning stubble in early scenes)

notes.educational_context: This character represents an everyday American professional. The goal is consistency across all images so learners can follow the same person through their day.
notes.cultural_context: American suburban lifestyle, mid-sized city, typical office worker routine
notes.pedagogical_goal: Help ESL students and children learn vocabulary by seeing the same relatable character interact with objects in context
